name: Status: In Progress
description: This issue/PR is being worked on

name: Status: Merge Conflict
description: To be applied to PR's that have a merge conflict and need updating

name: Status: Needs Dev Review
description: It requires review from a developer and approval

name: Status: Change Requested
description: To be applied to PR's that have asked for changes by reviewers

name: Status: Dev Reviewed
description: The issue/PR is approved by a developer

name: Status: Awaiting QA
description: To be applied to PR's that are ready for QA

name: Status: Ready to Merge
description: This PR is now ready to merge

name: QA: In Progress
description: To be applied to PR's that are QA testing on progress

name: QA: Approved
description: This PR is approved by the QA team

name: Needs Design
description: Requires help from the design team
